Question
========

A is de verzameling van even getallen en B van de oneven getallen. Wat is dan de doorsnede van A en B?

Answerlist
----------

* $A \cap B = \emptyset$
* $A \cap B = 0$
* $A \cap B = \text{even getallen}$
* $A \cap B = \text{oneven getallen}$

Solution
========

The correct answer is $A \cap B = \emptyset$
